Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Rivtower Technology was established in 2019 and is headquartered in Hangzhou. There are wholly-owned subsidiaries in Beijing, Shanghai and Suzhou. Our company is mainly engaged in the research and development of blockchain basic technology, blockchain application tools, and blockchain management platforms. Our projects cover the core parts in the blockchain field. For example, we designed and developed the enterprise-level and high-performance blockchain core CITA open source project, and established CITAHub, an open source technology exchange community, helps combine technology and business. The 2020 World Internet Conference released China's first cloud-native blockchain framework CITA-Cloud. What's more, the 2021 World Internet Conference released the RivSpace enterprise-level blockchain management platform and the RivTrust data asset management platform.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: There are documents, videos, photos, etc. For example, the company's platform users generate data involving supply chain, finance, leasing, government affairs, and energy.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Firstly our data is mainly stored on our hardware servers, so we mainly transfer the data through network bandwidth. We mainly use compression tools to compress the data for transmission.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
